'Failing to tune into music distracts me from external worries.'
15: 'Listening to music transports me through images or stories.'
'Music often triggers visual imagery in me.'
'I listen to music because it aesthetically pleases me.'
'Music contributes to my ability to sleep better.'
16: 'I listen to music to understand others' perspectives.'
'Listening to music enables me to gain insights into others.'
17: 'Listening to music brings me pleasure as an art form.'
18: 'Listening to music is comforting my body.'
'Listening to music evokes a feeling of sexual arousal in me.'
'I listen to music for its stimulating effect.'
'I listen to music because it induces physical sensations like a faster heartbeat and tingling sensations.'
19: 'Listening to music prompts the desire to make changes in the world.'
20: 'Listening to music enhances my intellectual abilities.'
'Listening to music helps align my thoughts.'
21: 'I listen to music to share my memories with friends.'
'Listening to music is a topic I can discuss with friends.'
'I listen to music as my friends do because it's a common practice among us.'
'I tune in music to meet new acquaintances.'
'Listening to music is my reason to meet with friends.'
'I am listening to music with my best friend, as we both enjoy discussing it together.'
'Listening to music creates a pleasant atmosphere for conversation.'
22: 'I listen to music to gain a better comprehension of the world.'
'Listening to music broadens my knowledge of the world.'
23: 'I am listening to music as it has spiritual significance.'
'Listening to music bolstered my religious beliefs.'
24: 'I listen to music to play or sing it myself.'
'I listen to music mainly to sing along.'
25: 'I listen to music as a way to convey my political beliefs.'
'Listening to music is a way to display political involvement.
26: 'Music is a key component in my daily routine.'
'Listening to music is my favorite pasttime.'
27: 'Listening to music is an exercise routine enhancing my fitness.'
'I listen to music while engaging in sports.'
28: 'Listening to music reflects my country's history and culture.'
'Listening to music is a way to showcase our unique culture.'
29: 'I listen to music to forge friendships with people who share similar tastes in music.'
'Listening to music serves as a conduit for me to connect with others who share a similar preference of music.'
'I listen to music due to a shared preference with my friends.'
'Music is a social experience, so I'm listening to it.'
30: 'I listen to music to connect with the artists or groups.'
'Listening to music is my way of immersing myself in a particular music scene.'
'Listening to music as role models.'
'I am listening to music because of my curiosity about the artists and groups.'
'Listening to music conjures up the concert sound in my imagination.'
31: 'I tune in to stay on top of current music hits and trends.'
'Listening to music to stay informed on music industry updates.'
'I am listening to music to learn something about it.'
'I am listening to music to acquire knowledge.'
